bio: I create educational content about the Ethereum ecosystem in German. My goal is to onboard more Germans to web3 by providing them guidelines (i.e. ab. Optimism)
contributionDescription:
Given that much of the content surrounding Optimism is primarily in English, a German-focused resource fills a gap, that I consider important. Currently, I have about 60 members in my community that I educate about L2s and that bought and delegated OP because of me. My plan is to extend the knowledge that I share on web3ma.de to add more value = impact. 

Additionally, I act as a delegate and currently represent 58 addresses. By regularly voting on proposals, I believe I contribute to the health and robustness of OP's governance. I do this because I believe in Optimism, not because I'm trying to get a grant :)

contributionLinks.description: Overview and onboarding guideline for Optimism

impactDescription: The measurable impact that I have created is 56 people buying OP token and delegating them to my address 0xtassilo.eth. The impact that is not measurable is how I helped them to do so and helped them understand Optimism as a network and all its possibilities (i.e. using velodrome)

fundingSources.description: I have not yet received any RPGF, or any other funding

pwCategorySuggestions: Content Creation, Community Building, Governance & Tokens
pwRecategorizeReason: NO, because the application repeatedly refers to "I" and "me", suggesting that the applicant is an individual, not a project.
